citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data and Information Service (NESDIS), National Climate Data Center (NCDC)
citeinfo.title: SST 8-Day Observation File

abstract.p: This data set contains SST observations from the AVHRR and exist in an 8-day rotating file. The file is organized in 5 by 5 degree lat/lon blocks and further in 1 by 1 degree subblocks.
The Office of Satellite Data Processing and Distribution keeps this data for a year, then sends it to the National Climatic Data Center for archiving.

idinfo.accconst: Check with Contributor about how to obtain data.
idinfo.useconst: Check with Contributor about how to obtain data.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
